welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Temescal Valley, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes and friendly community. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that our city has to offer and make unforgettable memories. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Riverside Municipal Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Riverside Fla-Bob Airport, handling all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights for major airlines such as Southwest and American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is the newest addition to the airport and serves mainly international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the WiFi network for free for up to 2 hours.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ryan Field Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ryan Field Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cable Airport

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Norton AFB Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Norton AFB Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport handles all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Municipal Airport serves private and charter flights, offering a comfortable and convenient experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
